alert.note: Alert for Clinton; St. Clair (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 07 at 5:59PM CDT until May 07 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Clinton County in south central Illinois... Northeastern St. Clair County in southwestern Illinois... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 559 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Mascoutah, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Mascoutah, Lebanon, New Baden, Scott AFB, Trenton, Aviston, Germantown, Albers, New Memphis, Damiansville, and Summerfield. This includes Interstate 64 in Illinois between exits 23 and 34. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
